name: Googelemental
description:
This game is a proof of concept for a Elemental-type game using Google Search to "combine" items. For every two block that collides with each other, it will search for a combination of those two blocks. Any block can be combined with another.The game is heavily drafted and is definitely unfinished.

To make a new element, you can press Tab, click on the text bar that appears, type in the element name and press Enter. A gray block will appear with your text.
